channel.title: [PI] Weapon switching glitch
channel.description:
Hi,
I recently found out that in my server when you for example equip a Chaotic Maul (a lot of strength bonus) and at the last moment switch to a dragon dagger, that you'll be using the special attack on the Strength Bonus of the Chaotic Maul (meaning you can do like 60-60 dragon dagger specials).
I've heard that its not too hard to fix, however no one could tell me where to, any suggestions?
Thank you.

item.title: [PI] Weapon switching glitch
item.dc:creator: @UniqueTrys UniqueTrys
item.description:

I’ve heard that its not too hard to fix, however no one could tell me where to, any suggestions?

Thank you.
